title: [Perivan's Weaponry]
[Perivan's General Store]
[Perivan's Outfitting]
description: Enclosed by mahogany paneled walls, the shop features a worn rug in the center of its mahogany floor.  A bundle of dried flowers hangs under the vaulted ceiling.  Right near the front is a vine-carved mahogany table and a gold-leafed mistwood cabinet.
